hard at work...

Recent generations have seen more and more people moving off the farms and into other lines of work. Here are a few examples of what we do in all sorts of places. We would be delighted if you could give us some more examples of busy family members. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
